AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Strength and Constitution scores each increase by 1.

SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Daunting
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

HitPointsFeature.Name: Tough
HitPointsFeature.Text: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.

SubRace.Name: Stensia
SubRace.Description: Countless generations of hardship and proximity to the vampire strongholds—leading to lost children and neighbors—have taught Stensians to guard their hearts. They are proud and fervent in their beliefs but seem brusque or even cold to the people of other provinces.
